Description (en):
Silencio is building the worldâ€™s ears for AI and robotics.
 Silencio powers voice AI, robotics, AR/VR, and spatial intelligence with ethically sourced, audio data at scale. With over 1.1 million users and >41 billion datapoints contributed, we are building the foundational layer for machine hearing. The market for real-world audio intelligence is projected to exceed $100 billion by 2030, fueled by virtual assistants, healthcare, robotics, and support systems. As demand for field data surges, Silencio is positioned as the go-to audio layer, capable of capturing any language, in any corner of the world.
 We transform everyday devices into a decentralized network of real-world audio sensors. Unlike traditional data models that extract information without consent, every datapoint is contributed voluntarily. Participation is always opt-in, anonymized, and rewarded, ensuring privacy and transparency.
